name: Status Posting
description:
This API is used to update the status on the userâ€™s wall.

Supported Providers: Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn.

Get Params.name: access_token
Get Params.description: Uniquely generated identifier key by LoginRadius that is activated after successful authentication.

Get Params.name: url
Get Params.description: URL to be included when clicking on the share.

Get Params.name: imageurl
Get Params.description: Image to be displayed in the share(Requires URL).

Get Params.name: status
Get Params.description: Main body of the Status update.

Get Params.name: caption
Get Params.description: Message displayed below the description(Requires URL, Under 70 Characters).

Get Params.name: description
Get Params.description: Description of the displayed URL and Image(Requires URL)
